item.description:
Happy Holidays everyone,
I will be hosting a yankee swap and potluck dinner, at my home in Pelham, NH.
Swap gifts should be around $15 each, and please indicate in your reply what you can bring for eats, drinks or dessert (preferably more healthy eats and lots of drinks, less calories...lol), so we won't have too much repetition.
I'll supply the salsa and chips, chip and dip, soda and water, and maybe even a sweet treat. Hot dips are welcome though ;)
I will email my address, and telephone number, to all who say "yes" or "maybe" 24 hours prior to the event.
Parking on the street should be on the side my house is on only! You may park on the lawn if there's no snow on it, or in the driveway if there is room.
Hope all your Holidays are Happy and filled with friends and family!!!
Merry Christmas and
hugs,
susan

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Yankee swap and potluck!
